spirit.name: The Botanist
spirit.description: The Botanist is a gin of layered complexity. A progressive exploration of the botanical heritage of our Isle of Islay.
spirit.longDescription: Hand-foraged on the windswept hills of Islay, The Botanist features 22 local botanicals that are gently distilled in our unique Lomond pot still. This artisanal Islay gin is a rare expression of the heart and soul of our remote Scottish island home.
servingsuggestions: Premium tonic water with a twist of lemon peel
Neat over ice to appreciate the complexity

spirit.name: Warners Elderflower Gin
spirit.description: Warners Elderflower gin captures everything we love about British summertime in a glass. Made on a working farm in Northamptonshire, infused with fresh elderflowers handpicked from the hedgerows.
spirit.longDescription: Warners Elderflower gin is infused with fresh elderflowers handpicked from the hedgerows surrounding Falls Farm. When you sip a Warners Elderflower G&T, you're tasting the countryside at its finest. Every bottle contains ingredients grown on their farm, and that connection to the land shines through in every sip.
servingsuggestions: Schweppes Slimline Elderflower tonic with fresh lime
Elderflower Collins with lemon and soda
Neat over ice to appreciate the floral notes

spirit.name: Redleg Spiced Rum
spirit.description: Caribbean warmth in a glass. Redleg Spiced Rum brings notes of vanilla, ginger and exotic spices to chase away the autumn chill.
spirit.longDescription: As September ushers in the first whispers of autumn, Redleg Spiced Rum arrives at The Anchor as your perfect seasonal companion. This Caribbean treasure takes its name from the red leg hermit crab, a symbol of the islands' vibrant spirit and warmth. Crafted with Jamaican pot still rum and infused with island spices including ginger, vanilla, cinnamon, and nutmeg, Redleg delivers a warming embrace that's perfect for those cooling September evenings.
tastingNotes: Tropical notes of pineapple and mango
servingSuggestions: With premium ginger beer and fresh lime
Classic rum & cola with a lime squeeze
Caribbean Dark & Stormy with ginger beer float
Neat over ice to appreciate the spice blend
